attributes.action: Remove Bounty chocolate from Celebrations selections.
attributes.additional_details: Because nobody enjoys Bounty. Bounty’s always end up getting chucked away and this is a mass waste of food and packaging. It is unethical to continue to put Bounty’s into the Celebrations selection.
attributes.background: Replace Bounty chocolate with either a better alternative or with an existing chocolate from the selection. For example, more Galaxy or Maltesers.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.
